entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
